title: Colorado coach guarantees win over Arizona
text: Colorado coach guarantees win over Arizona Saturday, 17 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Colorado coach Mike MacIntyre is 1-19 against in Pac-12 games since he took over the program. Arians: David Johnson Odd Man Out in RB Corps 00:42 Coach Bruce Arians indicated David Johnson will be the odd man out in the Cardinals' running back corps moving forward. Chris Johnson has been anointed Arizona's lead back, while a now-healthy Andre Ellington is likely to take over David Johnson's old "nickel back" role. "Itâ€™s not hard, because the...
